description: Minor material amendment to application ref: DC/17/05343/AMD2 under Section 73 of the Town and County Planning Act 1990 to vary condition 2 granted for a hotel with 56 bedrooms, a restaurant (and associated kitchen/servicing areas), lounge, gymnasium and associated access road together with service area and car parking and sub-station at Churchill Way (London Biggin Hill Airport) in order to allow additional floorspace, amendments to the plant, elevational treatments, modification to layout of PV panels, relocation of the bin store, new exterior lighting proposals, alterations to the car parking layout, introduction of an internal loop road and other servicing amendments, revisions to the landscaping scheme and to discharge/amend conditions: 3 (Materials), 4 (Hard and Soft Landscaping), 6 (SuDS), 20 (Bicycle Parking), 13 (Kitchen Extract System) and 23 (Energy Strategy).
